Summary: first it was small don't remember the color, then it brightened and looked like a huge fireball yellow, orange, white
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from a dance club, and noticed in the sky a bright light, looked like a fireball, I thought it was a shooting star but it wasn't high enough and wasn't moving. Then the bright colors diminish, then at the same spot it lighted up again,
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around October 28th 2011
